mapper.update: update carousel set carouse_color = #{carouseColor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, carouse_url = #{carouseUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, carouse_createtime = #{carouseCreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=BIT}, carouse_deletetime = #{carouseDeletetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where carousel_id = #{carouselId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select carousel_id, carouse_color, carouse_url, carouse_createtime, is_delete, carouse_deletetime from carousel limit #{pageNumber}, #{pageSize}
